description: This bolt, made of unknown material, can be used with a S-grade cross bow

name: Scroll of Escape: Kamael Village

name: Great Wolf Food
description: Automatically ingested when a Great Wolf's hunger gauge drops below 55%

name: Native Helmet
description: When you use this with Native Tunic and Pants, you can transform into a Native. Transformation will be cancelled if unequipped

name: Native Tunic
description: When you use this with Native Helmet and Pants, you can transform into a Native. Transformation will be cancelled if unequipped

name: Native Pants
description: When you use this with Native Helmet and Tunic, you can transform into a Native. Transformation will be cancelled if unequipped

name: Magic Bottle
description: Bottle that can hold the Chimera's M. Atk

name: Holy Water
description: Allows you to lay to rest ghosts in a temple

name: Darion's Badge
description: The spiritual force of Beleth's followers that is carried as a token. Whoever possesses this permit can travel freely throughout Hellbound whether he is a follower of Beleth, a native, or anyone else

name: Prayer Fragment
description: This fragment of an ancient prayer might be valuable to someone

name: Mark of Betrayal
description: A token that says you killed betrayers of Caravans

name: Ring of Wind Mastery
description: This ring permits you to withstand strong gusts of wind

name: Magic Gem
description: This is a key to open other dimensions

name: Steel Citadel Blueprints
description: These blueprints are extremely difficult to obtain

name: Dim Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera

name: Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera

name: Contained Life Force
description: Life Force absorbed from the Chimera Celtus

name: Sand Worm Tooth
description: This is an excellent item to use when bartering with caravans

name: Native Treasure
description: This can be found in a secret underground room in the town

name: Gate Key: Darkness
description: This key contains a Symbol of Darkness

name: Gate Key: Destruction
description: This key can open the Destruction Gate

name: Gate Key: Blood
description: This key bleeds continually

name: Ballista Bomb
description: You can use this to destroy Ballista and gain reputation

name: Spirit of the Lake
description: A spirit that is used to recover HP of Fafurion Families

name: Contaminated Crystal
description: A black and murky crystal. Needed in order to enter Crystal Caverns\0

name: Water Dragon Scale
description: Scales of Fafurion Families, which can harm certain targets. Has no effect when used on the wrong targets

name: Red Coral
description: A Red Coral Fragment which extends time. Used at Crystal Caverns Steam Corridor

name: Crystal Fragment
description: A Crystalline Golem Shard. Can be used in Crystal Caverns Coral Garden

name: Secret Key
description: A key used to open a Secret Gate

name: Blue Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Darnel. It may be used to save Parme

name: Red Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Kechi. It may be used to save Parme

name: Clear Crystal
description: A Crystal attained by killing Tears. It may be used to save Parme

name: Blue Coral Key
description: A key to open the Sapphire Gate

name: Red Coral Key
description: A key used to open the Gate that leads to the Steam Corridor
